title: Rp points not recieved
body: i bought rp but it said error, i didnt get the rp but the money got taken from my acc... what do i do?

replies.body: If your transaction resulted in an error then it shouldn't charge you.  It's likely that if anyone does show up it would stay at pending and go away.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help you individually to find why you're getting an error.  We'll get back to you!
write a ticket to the riot games support we cant help you we are just players like you
